description: The barrel chair is a common furniture item upholstered with polyester (PET) fabric over a cushion composed of polyurethane foam and expanded polystyrene wrapped in polyester (PET) batting. The frame of the barrel chair was composed of wood covered in polyurethane foam.
short desc: The barrel chair is a common furniture item upholstered with polyester (PET) fabric over a cushion composed of polyurethane foam and expanded polystyrene wrapped in polyester (PET) batting. The frame of the barrel chair was composed of wood covered in polyurethane foam.
source: Chairs were purchased from a national furniture manufacturer and distributor.
